narrative.narrative: WinAir Airlines was around from operations start January 25th,1998 until July 6th,1999. It was a charter airline that started offering public charters out of Long Beach,CA in November 1998 after it had been doing charters for clients such as sports teams beforehand also. Its corporate HQ was Salt Lake City,UT. The public charters were offered to Las Vegas,NV Salt Lake City,NV Oakland,CA and Sacramento,CA. The airline had personnel from other airlines like Morris Air,Key Airlines and Champion Air. Over its short life it had used five 737-200's,three 737-400's and two 737-300's. It had been planning on serving Seattle,WA as well but there was too much competition from LGB on this route.
